MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Questionnaire assessing phantom limb pain and related clinical variables

PLPNRS.Description: How much is your current phantom limb pain intensity?

PLPWords.Description: How much is your current phantom limb pain intensity?

MPQThrobbing.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as throbbing

MPQShooting.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as shooting

MPQStabbing.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as stabbing

MPQCramping.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as cramping

MPQSharp.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as sharp

MPQGnawing.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as gnawing

MPQHotBurning.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as hot-burning

MPQAching.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as aching

MPQHeavy.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as heavy

MPQTender.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as tender

MPQSplitting.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as splitting

MPQTiringExhausting.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as tiring-exhausting

MPQSickening.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as sickening

MPQFearful.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as fearful

MPQPunishingCruel.Description: The extent to which the phantom pain can be described as punishing-cruel

ADLInterference.Description: How much has phantom pain interfered with your activities of daily living in the last week?

WorkInterference.Description: How much has phantom pain interfered with your ability to work in the last week?

SleepInterference.Description: How much has phantom pain interfered with your sleep in the last week?

PLPLocation.Description: If you have PLP in your phantom limb, please look at the picture and mark the location(s) of the pain. (See separate image file, PLPlocation.png)

Telescoping.Description: If you experience that the phantom limb is shortened or even disappears into the stump (telescoping) please look at the picture and mark the perceived location of the hand/foot. (See separate image file, PLPlocation.png)

PLPFrequency.Description: How often do you have PLP?
